Velocity Obstacle

The Velocity Obstacle algorithm - Collision avoidance for ASVs in compliance with COLREGs

This package creates a new ROS node that can connect to the MARUS unity simulator and uses the collision aovidance algorithm to guide autonomous surface vehicles through the environment. The collision avoidacne algorithm is based on the Velocity Obstacle (VO) methode and acts in compliance with COLREGs.
